ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:20:13 [Issue ID 4000-1772432] urn:comicvine:4000-1772432 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/1772432 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 16:36:10. [Issue ID 1772432]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Forneus, the Mad Queen, now has a weapon that can slay Satan himself and allow her to take control of Hell forever! The stakes couldn't be any higher for overwhelmed Hellina and the fallen queen Scythe, but they have been outmatched at every turn. It's time for a desperate gamble!
Available with a host of sexy stunning covers with this issue including a Regular & Wraparound Covers by series artist Gabriel Andrade, Bad Girl Cover by Christian Zanier, Enforcer Cover by Ron Adrian, Sacrilege Cover by Raulo Caceres, and Stunning Cover by Matt Martin. Plus an array of super limited covers for the collector including a Fetish Fashion Set (of 3 books, limited to 250 copies) and a Nude & Naughty Set (of 3 books, limited to 350 copies), by Christian Zanier. And for the erotic art collectors, there is the Wraparound Nude by Andrade, Bad Girl Nude by Zanier, Enforcer Nude by Adrian, Sacrilege Nude by Caceres, and Stunning Nude by Martin. We top it off with Adult covers - Century Adult Cover (limited to 100 copies) and Stunning Adult by Martin, Bad Girl Adult and the E and F covers to the Six Sins Adult Cover Set by Zanier (this will be a set of six, the final two offered here).
